pages.title: Slot Machine
pages.text: $(byellow)Slot Machine$() is a machine that can $(bred)consume sun to draw$(). Each draw cost you 25 sun, and you have chance to get a enjoy card or sun or gem.$(br)You can get the block in Sun Temple.

$(s)In order to prevent players from being addicted to lottery draws$(), the number of player draws is very limited.$(br)$(bred)Players can only draw 10 times initially. Each time the player's TreeLevel increases by 1, it will increase 3 times. Each time the invasion ends, the reward will also get 2 chances$().
